title: Microsoft has started testing Wi-Fi 7 support in Windows 11
description: Microsoft is testing support for Wi-Fi 7 in Windows 11, which offers multi-gigabit speeds and improved throughput, latency, and reliability compared to previous Wi-Fi generations. [...]

title: Microsoft now force installing Windows 11 23H2 on eligible PCs
description: Microsoft has started force installing Windows 11 23H2 on eligible devices that have reached or are close to their end-of-servicing date. [...]

title: Bitwarden’s new auto-fill option adds phishing resistance
description: The Bitwarden open-source password management service has introduced a new inline auto-fill menu that addresses the risk of user credentials being stolen through malicious form fields. [...]

title: ScreenConnect servers hacked in LockBit ransomware attacks
description: Attackers are exploiting a maximum severity authentication bypass vulnerability to breach unpatched ScreenConnect servers and deploy LockBit ransomware payloads on compromised networks. [...]

title: FTC to ban Avast from selling browsing data for advertising purposes
description: The U.S. Federal Trade Commission (FTC) will order Avast to pay $16.5 million and ban the company from selling the users' web browsing data or licensing it for advertising purposes. [...]

title: Massive AT&T outage impacts US mobile subscribers
description: Tens of thousands of U.S. customers from Verizon, T-Mobile, and AT&T have been complaining about lack of wireless service or interruptions on Thursday morning. [...]

title: Massive AT&T, Verizon, and T-Mobile outage impacts US customers
description: Tens of thousands of U.S. customers from Verizon, T-Mobile, and AT&T have been complaining about lack of wireless service or interruptions on Thursday morning. [...]

title: LockBit ransomware secretly building next-gen encryptor before takedown
description: LockBit ransomware developers were secretly building a new version of their file encrypting malware, dubbed LockBit-NG-Dev - likely a future LockBit 4.0, when law enforcement took down the cybercriminal's infrastructure earlier this week. [...]
